bdi4jade.goal

Class PropositionalBeliefValueGoal<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.goal.BeliefValueGoal<K,java.lang.Boolean>
      • bdi4jade.goal.PropositionalBeliefValueGoal<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the belief name.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeliefGoal<K>, Goal, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable

    public class PropositionalBeliefValueGoal<K>
extends BeliefValueGoal<K,java.lang.Boolean>
    This class represents the goal of an agent to believe in a certain belief with an specific boolean value, that is, the agent has a belief whose name and value are specified in this goal.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropositionalBeliefValueGoal

        public PropositionalBeliefValueGoal()
        Default constructor.

      • PropositionalBeliefValueGoal

        public PropositionalBeliefValueGoal(K beliefName,
                                    java.lang.Boolean value)
        Creates a new PropositionalBeliefValueGoal with the provided belief name and a boolean value. This value represents the value that is aimed to be associated with the belief.
        Parameters:
        beliefName - the belief name.
        value - the boolean value that is target of this goal.
